name: places/ChIJ-8p8DYNZwokRvHCO9ae8sz8
formattedAddress: 670 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 670 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA

editorialSummary.text: Customized salads, wraps & smoothies are the specialties of this counter-service chain.

originalText.text: I love this Just Salad location and the chain in general.  Firstly, this location is spacious and accommodating, with ample seating and excellent management.  I have visited at least three times per week since July, when they opened, and I have always been delighted.  NOW, if you have read this far, thank you.  More importantly, I thank the staff; all the people I have met and interacted with are regularly attentive and kind.  The training process is very supportive and comprehensive, as I have noticed that many staff members have been here since the opening and treat the guests with terrific customer service skills.  I know many staff members by name, and we greet each other enthusiastically.  There is excellent energy in this store.  I believe my neighborhood has taken to this store because the employees do a terrific job serving and giving each patron good vibes.  I always see smiles and appreciation.  I highly recommend you visit and enjoy everything there is to experience here.

originalText.text: Be wary of ordering from here on the Too Good to Go app. We tried it tonight for the first time and they canceled our order a few minutes before pickup started. It sounds like they’re hoping people will already by almost there and decide to go ahead, still order but pay full price for a bowl which just feels…a bit dishonest. When we called to ask why the order was cancelled the woman lied and said they were out of food at that location even as we stood inside and watched them making salads for a line of people. Odd business practice and we then had to quickly scramble to get a different dinner for our 7yr-old

originalText.text: The 670 Columbus Avenue Just Salad store is uniquely special as compared to other Just Salad stores I have gone to. The staff members, including the manager, are warm, personable, efficient and quick. They connect with customers in thoughtful ways, such as literally memorizing the salad selection of each returning customer. Now this is the way to run a business!!! Thank you.

originalText.text:
Gabriel Jean is an  excellent representation of Just Salad. He is very pleasant and helpful and since I am  a senior, I especially appreciate his patience.
I hope you appreciate him as your employee as I do.
I am a steady customer and glad to have Just SALAD here on the Upper Westside.
Kudos!
From Hazel Rosetta Smith

originalText.text: I go to this just salad pretty often and every time I go, Gabriel goes above and beyond with his customer service. He’s so nice, always in a good mood and extremely helpful. It’s nice being greeted by the staff here.
